Package nzilbb.papareo

Class PapaReo

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.papareo.PapaReo
  • public class PapaReo
extends Object
    Client for the Papa Reo web API.

    Usage

    Use the this class for accessing the web API, something like: 

     // Create client with access token
 PapaReo papaReo = new PapaReo().setToken(token);
 
 // short utterance transcription:
 File wav = new File("short-utterance.wav");
 String text = papaReo.transcribeUtterance(new FileInputStream(wav));
 System.out.println(text);
 
 // long recording transcription:
 File wav = new File("long-speech.wav");
 
 // start transcription task
 String taskId = papaReo.transcribeLarge(new FileInputStream(wav));
 
 // wait for it to complete
 String status = papaReo.transcribeLargeStatus(taskId);
 while (("STARTED".equals(status) || "PENDING".equals(status)) && patience > 0) {
   try {Thread.sleep(1000);} catch(Exception exception) {}
   status = papaReo.transcribeLargeStatus(taskId);
 }
 
 // save the resulting VTT file
 InputStream stream = papaReo.transcribeLargeDownload(taskId);
 File vtt = new File("long-speech.vtt");
 java.nio.file.Files.copy(
       stream, 
       vtt.toPath(), 
       StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
 stream.close();

    Note that the access token can also be specified by:

    • setting the PAPAREO_TOKEN environment variable, or
    • setting the papareo.token system property (e.g. java -Dpapareo.token=xxxx ...).
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert.fromont@canterbury.ac.nz

    • Constructor Detail

      • PapaReo

        public PapaReo()
        Default constructor. If the papareo.token system property is set, it will be used as the token. Otherwise, if the PAPAREO_TOKEN environment variable is set, it will be used as the token. Otherwise, setToken(String) will have to be called to specify the token.

      • PapaReo

        public PapaReo​(String token)
        Constructor with token.
        Parameters:
        token - API access token.

      • setToken

        public final PapaReo setToken​(String newToken)
        Setter for token: API access token.

        This is declared final to prevent access to the token via inheritance.

        Parameters:
        newToken - API access token.

      • transcribe

        public javax.json.JsonObject transcribe​(InputStream audio_file,
                                        boolean with_metadata)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        PapaReoException
        Implementation of transcribe method: Bilingual Transcribe English and Māori, optionally including metadata on timing and confidences.
        Parameters:
        audio_file - The contents of the audio file to transcribe.
        with_metadata - Whether to return extended data (e.g. alignment information) with the transcript or not.
        Returns:
        The JSON object response of the request, which should include a "transcription" attribute that contains the text of the transcript.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.
        See Also:
        transcribeUtterance(InputStream)

      • transcribeUtterance

        public String transcribeUtterance​(InputStream audio_file)
                           throws IOException,
                                  PapaReoException
        Convenience method for calling transcribe(InputStream,boolean) and getting back just the transcript.
        Parameters:
        audio_file - The contents of the audio file to transcribe.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.
        See Also:
        transcribe(InputStream,boolean)

      • transcribeLarge

        public String transcribeLarge​(InputStream audio_file)
                       throws IOException,
                              PapaReoException
        Implementation of transcribe/large method: Start a transcription for large audio files of te reo Māori.
        Parameters:
        audio_file - The contents of the audio file to transcribe.
        Returns:
        The task ID of the running task.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.

      • transcribeLargeStatus

        public String transcribeLargeStatus​(String task_id)
                             throws IOException,
                                    PapaReoException
        Implementation of transcribe/large/{task_id}/status method: Check the status of our large audio file transcription.
        Parameters:
        task_id - The task ID returned by transcribeLarge(InputStream).
        Returns:
        The current status of the task: one of "STARTED", "PENDING", "REVOKED", or "SUCCESS".
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.
        See Also:
        transcribeLarge(InputStream)

      • transcribeLargeCancel

        public String transcribeLargeCancel​(String task_id)
                             throws IOException,
                                    PapaReoException
        Implementation of transcribe/large/{task_id}/cancel method: Cancel the transcription for large audio files of te reo Māori.
        Parameters:
        task_id - The task ID returned by transcribeLarge(InputStream).
        Returns:
        The message returned by the request.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.
        See Also:
        transcribeLarge(InputStream)

      • transcribeLargeDownload

        public InputStream transcribeLargeDownload​(String task_id)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           PapaReoException
        Implementation of transcribe/large/{task_id}/download method: Download the transcription for large audio files of te reo Māori.
        Parameters:
        task_id - The task ID returned by transcribeLarge(InputStream).
        Returns:
        The current status of the task - one of "STARTED", "PENDING", "SUCCESS".
        Throws:
        IOException - If a communication error occurs.
        PapaReoException - If the Papa Reo API could not successfully process the request.
        See Also:
        transcribeLarge(InputStream)
